analysis.description:
IbmiToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/45/0x594a69eb7d76be8ac1b0c00589389b2025d826c8.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x594a69eb7d76be8ac1b0c00589389b2025d826c8.sol#222-234)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x594a69eb7d76be8ac1b0c00589389b2025d826c8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/45/0x594a69eb7d76be8ac1b0c00589389b2025d826c8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/45/0x594a69eb7d76be8ac1b0c00589389b2025d826c8.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
